aws_wafregional_rule.description: Provides an AWS WAF Regional rule resource for use with ALB.

name.description: The name or description of the rule.

metric_name.description: The name or description for the Amazon CloudWatch metric of this rule.

predicate.description: The objects to include in a rule (documented below).

id.description: The ID of the WAF Regional Rule.

arn.description: The ARN of the WAF Regional Rule.
